intro: Hurry up, medic! Your help is needed!
description:
Try your hand at being a lifesaver. Check the hospital life from the inside. Face the tough situations and help people. Feel the rush of the sleepless duty. 

Meet the ambulance and carefully unload the sick. Give first aid immediately if needed. Quickly and carefully escort patients to the ward or to the doctor. You may have to go straight to the operating theatre, so lives may depend on your decisions. 

Respond quickly to emergencies and help the doctors. Patients' lives depend on your speed and experience. All first aid is up to you. 

Learn different procedures and use the necessary medical equipment to keep patients safe. Much depends on your decisions. 

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

You can save lives!
